com.interpss.core.algo.config

Interface VoltageAdjControlConfig

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseLfAdjustControlConfig, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VoltageAdjControlConfigImpl

    public interface VoltageAdjControlConfig
extends BaseLfAdjustControlConfig
    A representation of the model object 'Voltage Adj Control Config'. Loadflow voltage adjustment/control configuration class

    The following features are supported:

    • Pv Limit Adjust Only
    • Discrete Adjust
    See Also:
    LfAdjAlgoConfigPackage.getVoltageAdjControlConfig()

    • Method Detail

      • isPvLimitAdjustOnly

        boolean isPvLimitAdjustOnly()
        Returns the value of the 'Pv Limit Adjust Only' attribute. The default value is "false". This attribute let you set PVLimit Control only.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Pv Limit Adjust Only' attribute.
        See Also:
        setPvLimitAdjustOnly(boolean), LfAdjAlgoConfigPackage.getVoltageAdjControlConfig_PvLimitAdjustOnly()

      • setPvLimitAdjustOnly

        void setPvLimitAdjustOnly(boolean value)
        Sets the value of the 'Pv Limit Adjust Only' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Pv Limit Adjust Only' attribute.
        See Also:
        isPvLimitAdjustOnly()

      • isDiscreteAdjust

        boolean isDiscreteAdjust()
        Returns the value of the 'Discrete Adjust' attribute. The default value is "true". attribute to control if discrete voltage should be applied in a Loadflow run. This is a global control flag, used to control calling the AclfNetwork.needDiscreteAdjust() method.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Discrete Adjust' attribute.
        See Also:
        setDiscreteAdjust(boolean), LfAdjAlgoConfigPackage.getVoltageAdjControlConfig_DiscreteAdjust()

      • setDiscreteAdjust

        void setDiscreteAdjust(boolean value)
        Sets the value of the 'Discrete Adjust' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Discrete Adjust' attribute.
        See Also:
        isDiscreteAdjust()
